Package jcolibri.cbrcore

Interface Summary
CBRTerm Root of the CBR ontology declared over JColibrí, currently is just a mark interface that all members of the ontolgy will specialize directly or through some inheritance
 

Class Summary
CBRContext Class that serves as communication between methods execution.
CBRContextChecker Instance of this class will track the changed on the context because of a CBR application configuration.
CBRCore This class will manage the framework.
CBRGlobalSimilarity Represents the concept Global Similarity Function of CBROnto.
CBRLocalSimilarity Represents the concept Local Similarity Function of CBROnto.
CBRMethod Represnts any method that will solve a CBRTask on this system.
CBRSimilarity Represents the concept Similarity function of CBROnto.
CBRSimilarityParam A parameter of a similarity funciton.
CBRState Instance of this class will hold the current configuration status of the CBR appliaction being developed.
CBRTask Represent the task concept inside the framework.
CBRTaskNode Instances of this class compose the internal representation of the task hierarchy.
DataType Represents the type of a simple attribute of a case.
DataTypePkgReg Manager of the datatypes of a package.
DataTypesRegistry Registry of the managers of the package datatypes.
GlobalSimilarityRegistry Registry of the managers of the package global similarities.
GlobalSimilPkgReg Manager of the global similarities of a package.
LocalSimilarityRegistry Registry of the managers of the package local similarities.
LocalSimilPkgReg Manager of the local similarities of a package.
MethodCondition Restriction of a parameter of a method.
MethodParameter Parameter object that can declared for any method.
MethodsInstanceRegistry Registry for currently created method instances.
MethodType Enumerate to specify the kind of method
PrototypeMethodPkgReg Manager of the methods of a package.
PrototypeMethodsRegistry Registry of the managers of the package methods.
PrototypeTaskPkgReg Manager of the tasks of a package.
PrototypeTasksRegistry Registry of the managers of the package tasks.
TasksInstanceRegistry Registry for currently created tasks instances.
